thread.title: Defending champ San Miguel barrels into Philippine Cup semis
thread.title_full: Defending champ San Miguel barrels into Philippine Cup semis

author: Jane Bracher
title: Defending champ San Miguel barrels into Philippine Cup semis
text:
Defending champ San Miguel barrels into Philippine Cup semis San Miguel, holding a twice-to-beat advantage, gets past Rain or Shine and into the best-of-7 semis Published 6:43   6:46   SIZZLING. RR Garcia (R) connects on 5 shots from beyond the arc to finish with a game-high 25 points as San Miguel reaches the semifinals. Photo from PBA Images 
MANILA, Philippines â€“ Defending champions and top seed San Miguel Beermen flexed their muscles and powered past eighth seed Rain or Shine Elasto Painters, 98-91, to book the first semifinals ticket in the 2017 PBA Philippine Cup on Sunday, February 5 at the Ynares Center in Antipolo. 
San Miguel, holding a twice-to-beat advantage, needed only one game to get past Rain or Shine and into the best-of-7 semis, racing to a 15-point lead in the first half and did not falter since. 
The Beermen will await the winner between TNT and GlobalPort's best-of-3 quarters matchup with the KaTropa leading that series 1-0. 
RR Garcia sizzled for 5 triples to finish with 25 points to go with 3 assists. 
Beau Belga paced Rain or Shine with 18 points and 4 rebounds as they rallied several times in the second half but fell short. 
Scores : San Miguel (98) : Garcia 25, Fajardo 14, Sntos 13, Ross 13, Lassiter 11, Espinas 10, Cabagnot 9, Tubid 3, De Ocampo 0. Rain or Shine (91) : Belga 18, Washington 16, Norwood 14, Ahanmisi 12, Ponferada 10, Yap 9, Chan 6, Cruz 4, Matias 2, Tolomia 0, Tiu 0, Trollano 0. Quarter scores : 28-21, 51-38, 74-67, 98-91.
